Description:
Freshly Renovated Classic
Set in one of Epping's most sought after pockets, is this recently renovated classic that is sure to tick all the right boxes. This stunning family home features four bedrooms, three with built in robes including master with WIR and ensuite, large living area with adjoining dining and gourmet kitchen fitted with 40mm stone bench tops and S/S appliances.
Great features to the home include freshly polished boards throughout living, steel appliances, split system heating/cooling, quality window furnishings, single garage with additional second entrance with cross over, perfect for any boat/trailer/car or caravan enthusiast alike, landscaped front and rear gardens and much more.
All this set on a generous 584m² approx. in a quiet court location.
Within close proximity to Northern Hospital, Epping plaza and local shopping centres, established schools, Epping train station and bus services.
This home is perfect start for first home buyers or one to add to any investor's portfolio. Don't miss your opportunity to purchase this property.
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
767 High Street Epping
219 High Street Thomastown
510 Plenty Road Mill Park
952-954 High Street Reservoir
http://rata.harcourts.com.au/Home/statement-of-information

Description:
Family Living at its Finest
Step up into this warm family home, stunning in every way this property exudes style and sophistication, surrounded by beautifully established low maintenance gardens, offering exceptional accommodation with flexibility of lifestyle to create the ideal family environment in the highly sought after Lyndarum Estate. Designed with family in mind this immaculately presented home offers excellent quality and design, individuality and plenty of space. Measuring 46squres (approx) and offering four living zones, a superbly appointed kitchen with butler’s pantry, stone benchtops and quality s/s appliances all overlooking the hospitable family area that hosts a stunning gas fireplace with concrete feature mantel. The outdoor zone opens via timber byfold doors to a fully decked alfresco area where you are certain to entertain all year-round. The upstairs area consists of four very large bedrooms, master with spacious grand full ensuite including double sized shower, his and her basins and dressing room. The upstairs retreat is perfect for the kids or as a teenager living area. This home has added extras like, 3 phase refrigerated air conditioning with 2 zones for upstairs and downstairs, Vic ash solid timber staircase, Western Australian mahogany solid timber floors upstairs, Cedar timber front facing windows and much much more, all this on a very rare 608sqm of land with Park Frontage. Take advantage now and live the dream tomorrow.

Description:
Home Sweet Home
Upon stepping into this beautiful property, youll feel right at home! Featuring a renovated kitchen with ample storage apace, quality 900mm S/S appliances and granite benchtops, a huge living area, master bedroom that features BIR and a full en-suite, well-established gardens with a massive pergola on a spacious 521m2 block. A convenient location that is right in the middle of Epping central with Schools, Shops and transport at your fingertips, is what caps off this beautiful home. Providing a great opportunity for first home buyers entering the market and ideal for investors who focus on future growth of the north.

Description:
Everything You Need Set Amongst Everything You Want!
Experience a family lifestyle with this exquisite and impeccably presented family home offering an arrangement of spacious living areas and a sleek and stylish design.
Positioned in the prestigious Lyndarum estate, this lovely home offers a world of convenience with access to scenic walking/bike trails through sprawling parklands, St Mary of the Cross MacKillop and Epping Views Primary Schools, Epping North Medical Centre, Northern Hospital, Lyndarum Drive shops, Epping Plaza and Epping train station and bus services, all just minutes away, making this the perfect environment in which to raise your young family.
Offering a great mix between entertaining areas and retreats, the striking open plan living boasts a gourmet kitchen with stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and splashback, adjoining large dining and family zone with open gas fire place, home theatre room, four generous-sized bedrooms, master with stylish ensuite and WIR, grand alfresco area and a massive remote controlled garage.
Other features include ducted heating and cooling, ducted vacuum, intercom system and two large garden sheds all on a large block of 548m2 approx.
With plenty of wow factor on offer, this lovely home is just waiting for you to enjoy.
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
219 High Street Thomastown
767 High Street Epping
510 Plenty Road Mill Park
952-954 High Street Reservoir

Description:
Explore your Empire
Located in the heart of Epping, like a star in the north, Empire Epping will rise above the rest offering unsurpassed premium real estate opportunities with apartments offering 1, 2 & 3 bedroom configurations with quality fixtures and fittings, garage allocation, inhouse gym and wellness centre, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
Just minutes from the door of EMPIRE EPPING you'll find a world of facilities and amenities — everything you and your family need to live, learn and work. Less than 2km away is Pacific Epping, one of the region's largest shopping precincts, boasting 230-plus stores, three major supermarkets, fresh food precinct, bars, cafes and restaurants and more.
Setting a new standard in high-end integrated living, EMPIRE EPPING offers a complete lifestyle package in one of Melbourne's most affordable up-and-coming areas. Whether you're looking to set your family up in style, downsize for luxury and convenience, or invest in a hot growth region, claim your place in EMPIRE EPPING - A World Within.
http://rata.harcourts.com.au/Home/statement-of-information

Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
Generous Indoor Outdoor Living in a Premium Pocket
Please Note: Photo ID identification upon inspection is required.
Enhanced by period detail including bay windows, timber floors, high ceilings adorned with decorative cornice, picture rails and block mounted switches, this spacious home delivers fabulous family living behind a classically captivating façade.
Effectively laid out for family harmony, the main bedroom with ensuite, study, and theatre room (perfect for a great night in) are at the front of the house, and effectively zoned from three bedrooms and the spa family bathroom at the other. In between you'll discover a very generous living dining area anchored by a solid timber kitchen and stretching the width of the house…so there's plenty of private space when you want it, and space to get together when you need to! A generous covered alfresco precinct with built in BBQ adds yet another entertainment option.
With ducted refrigerated climate control, CCTV, alarm, double garage with rear roller door for trailer parking, a mix of carpet and timber flooring heading a long list of extras; and a location a short walk from the bus and central to Epping Plaza and station, Westfield and the South Morang station, this will not last long!

Description:
When Comfort And Convenience Unite
Substantial spaces, a sought-after central location, immaculate presentation and separate self-contained accommodation defines the outstanding opportunity presented by this immaculate family home directly opposite the Greenbrook Village and with the bus at the door!
Set well back from the street for easy access and exit, the home itself introduces three bedrooms, two of which enjoy direct access to the first of two bathrooms, a large living room and adjoining dining, huge laundry, sunroom (second living space) and an eat-in kitchen updated with a 900 mm range and cabinetry in timeless black and white.
The north facing rear yard is home to a separate accommodation, where open plan living and a bedroom served by an ensuite deliver private spaces for guests, teens, in-laws or to run your home based business.
Central to Westfield and the Epping Plaza and their nearby stations, it includes desired extras of ducted heating and cooling, timber floors, decorative cornice, window tint, solar power and roller shutters. A versatile blend of comfort and convenience, this will not last long!

Description:
Epping's Best Kept Secret
Step inside and be transported into a world of contemporary 5-star luxury, innovation and timeless quality in this exclusive Mediterranean-inspired Villa.
Built in 2014 to the highest quality standards, this architecturally designed home commands your attention immediately upon arrival, from the Travertine paved driveway and Mediterranean roof tiles, to the grand entrance of the home enhanced by the Spanish wrought iron front doors. This meticulously crafted four bedroom, two bathroom plus study masterpiece delivers unsurpassed lifestyle excellence the moment you step inside. Be welcomed home every time to a 5-star experience with floor to wall timeless imported Italian Marble throughout.
The lavish hotel-inspired luxury master suite features a spacious parent's retreat with American Oak feature panelling, 5-star deluxe ensuite with double stone vanity, large Italian Marble tiled double shower and bath, leading through to the spacious walk-in wardrobe boasting custom built cabinetry.
The free flowing floorplan provides a front formal lounge, executive style study with glass partition wall, open living area with gourmet kitchen fit for a king, boasting 60mm solid marble benches with waterfall edges, premium ILVE and Miele appliances and mirror splashbacks.
Movie nights at your house have never been more enjoyable, with a dedicated luxury theatre room that includes 100inch projector screen, Optima projector and Boston surround sound speaker system, ensuring that your family time will be maximised.
The fully enclosed resort style alfresco boasts an entertaining area with floor to ceiling Turkish Travertine tiles, and double glazed bi-fold and French doors offering ample space for year-round entertaining.
This home boasts a number of quality fixtures and fittings including but not limited to;
- Commercial luxury carpet
- Commercial grade skirting
- Commercial grade pull handles
- 2.4 metre mahogany style internal doors imported from USA
- Self-closing doors
- Commercial door frames
- Laser level ceilings
- 2.7m ceilings with square set finishes
- Stack stone Travertine feature walls
- Commercial LED lighting
- Commercial grade vinyl timber flooring
- Imported Italian Marble throughout the home
- Commercial thermal glazed windows with fly screens
- Refrigerated heating/cooling system with commercial vents and zoned controls
- Legrand electronic touch switches
- Dahua commercial grade security system with SIM card Alarm monitoring
- Vtech video phone monitoring doorbell system
An oversized 6.4m x 6m garage with motorised cedar timber garage door and rear drive through access completes this incredible package all set on a generous 614m2 approx. in one of Epping's most sought after positions, with the added convenience of Schooling, Transport and Shopping just moments away.
With so many more features to experience, you must see this home to believe and appreciate its grandeur and 5-star luxury.
Don't miss your opportunity to inspect this stunning home today!
PHOTO ID REQUIRED!
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
767 High Street Epping
219 High Street Thomastown
510 Plenty Road Mill Park

Description:
Prime Position With Options To Explore
This single level family home is perfect for those wanting space, comfort and the convenience of a sought after central location. Set on a generous 555sqm (approx) corner allotment it offers a spacious light filled lounge and dining, well laid out kitchen overlooking a generous family meals area, and three robed bedrooms sharing the family bathroom.
A large paved outdoor area, perfect for summer entertaining, or just as a space for the kids to ride their trikes and scooters, is complemented by a large lawn in a rear yard that includes a shed and gated access from the carport, for trailer parking.
A short walk to the bus, school and local shops, and a few minutes' drive to Epping Plaza and the station, you can secure an enjoyable foothold on the property ladder, then when ready introduce some value adding style with a contemporary update or or maybe even an extension if desired (stca).

Description:
The Perfect Start In A Great Location
Ideally positioned in one of Epping's most sought after pockets and surrounded with all the comforts of modern living at your fingertips, this immaculately presented family home is situated within walking distance to Epping Train station, Epping Plaza, Dalton Shopping Village, St Monica's College & Melbourne Polytechnic with just a short commute to Northern Hospital, recreational facilities, cafes & restaurants.
Sitting on a great parcel of land (609m2 approx) and providing an enjoyable family lifestyle, this lovely home offers four large bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR, BIR to other 3 bedrooms, formal lounge and dining area, fully equipped galley style timber kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, internal access to quadruple garage and additional kitchen facilities, large meals leading out to undercover entertainment area with decking, family room and central bathroom with corner spabath.
Other features include; ducted heating, evaporative cooling, downlights, security shutters, garden shed and beautifully landscaped low maintenance rear and front yard.
Do not miss out on this great opportunity. Inspection is an absolute must.

This well-presented family home is as central as they come. Situated in the heart of Epping only minutes away from all your local amenities such as St Monica's College, St Peters Primary, Epping Train Station, Pacific Epping shopping centre, Greenbrook shops and so much more!
Comprising three large bedrooms all with BIR's serviced by a recently updated central bathroom, spacious study, extensive kitchen with ample storage overseeing a substantial sunken lounge with an abundance of natural sun light, generous living zone and adjoining meals area.
Further features consist of a large back yard with undercover entertainment area, a perfect setting to entertain on any occasion, well-manicured gardens front and rear as well as heating and cooling.

Description:
Easy Living With Everything Nearby
Conveniently nestled within the sought after Lyndarum Estate, diagonally opposite parklands and a short walk to the supermarket, cafes, shops, bus and school this perfectly positioned, proportioned and presented home is ready to entice owner-occupiers and investors alike! Once you step inside be captured by the quality, charm and space this property has to offer. Featured upstairs are three bedrooms, lovely large ensuite and walk-in robe to master bedroom overlooking parklands. As an extra bonus there is a study nook. Upstairs modern bathroom and downstairs separate lounge room, the kitchen is complemented with an island bench, stainless steel appliances overlooking large meals/family area, laundry and enclosed paved courtyard can be accessed via the kitchen and remote lock up garage. Other features include quality carpets, plantation window shutters, dishwasher and ducted heating. Close to distance to all facilities and offers a convenient and low-maintenance lifestyle ready for you to enjoy.
Heating : Ducted
Chattels: All Fixtures and fittings as inspected
Deposit: 10% of the purchase price
Preferred Settlement: 60-70 Days
Nearest Primary Schools: Epping View Primary, Epping Primary, St Mary Of The Cross Mackillop Primary
Nearest Secondary Schools: Epping Secondary College, St Monicas College
Nearest Shopping: Epping Plaza, Lyndarum Epping North, Aurora Village,
Nearest Public Transport: Bus, Epping Train Station

Description:
Add The Finishing Touch!
Set in a tree lined street, amongst quality homes, is this neat brick veneer residence, within close proximity to local schools, Epping Plaza and an array of transport options. Comprising master bedrooms with BIR and ensuite, two further bedrooms with BIR's, central kitchen, gas top stove and lots of bench space, dining and separate lounge room. Also features gas heating, cooling, expansive rear yard, garden shed and side drive to carport. Ideal for the first home buyer or investor, with a potential rental of $18,000 per annum approx..

Description:
Ready Made Investment
Instant appeal with a welcoming façade, this inviting 3 bedroom home has all the features you need on a low maintenance allotment. It comprises a formal lounge room, with open plan kitchen/meals area that includes ample cupboard & pantry space for storage. The modern kitchen, complete with stainless steel appliances includes a dishwasher. All bedrooms are robed and carpeted. Features ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout, two bathrooms, double garage with internal access and outdoor undercover entertaining area. This home is equipped with remote control alarm, roller shutters and located in a quiet pocket close to schools, shops and public transport. Epping Plaza & Westfield South Morang just a short drive away.
The ideal investment with secure tenants! Currently leased at $365 p/w ($1586pcm) until late September 2018.
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
952-954 High Street Reservoir
510 Plenty Road Mill Park
767 High Street Epping
219 High Street Thomastown

Description:
PRIME LOCATION, LOW MAINTANCE LIVING!
Nest or invest' Whatever your circumstances, this well positioned property can cater to your needs. This 1 bedroom apartment, centrally located bathroom with a generous sized kitchen, plus a spacious lounge and dining area. With sliding doors that open up to your very own private balcony. Other features include heating, cooling, security entrance and secure parking. This well-priced first home or investment awaits!
• 150m walk to Woolworths
• 350m Epping Views Primary School
• 3km to Epping Train Station
• 3km to Epping Hospital
